title: 과거 경험 대화 듣기
description: 과거에 했던 일에 대한 대화를 듣고 이해합니다.

audio.text: Hi, I'm Mike. [PAUSE] Last weekend was great! [PAUSE] On Saturday, I went to the beach with my family. [PAUSE] We played volleyball and swam in the ocean. [PAUSE] On Sunday, I visited my grandparents. [PAUSE] We had lunch together and talked about many things. [PAUSE] It was a wonderful weekend!

targetSentences: I went to the beach with my family.
